answers.answer: When ever you want will be fine

Im 22 weeks and I already started my registry, I just haven't told anyone yet... I like the idea of starting it now because then when you get your baby shower plans, your not stressing over getting it done :)

Good idea! I think I may start mine tonight lol. I'm just nervous because I have high blood pressure (recently started) & have had protein in my urine. They aren't thinking preeclampsia yet, but my oldest sister had it with her first & we usually go through the same things (very weird lol). I also have a cyst the size of 5.5 & they're monitoring it because it CAN'T get bigger or I'll  be in trouble. Sorry for the rant haha

question: When should I do my registry? I am keeping the gender a secret from everyone (besides this site lol) until Christmas, but I'm going to be 21 weeks & a high risk pregnancy. Thanks in advance.
title: Baby registry
